titleStmt.title: Magical handbook with love spell, spell against headache

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License.

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Outdent ll. 1—5 and 15 before finalization; same with ll. 28, 31, 36 l. 1, 6, 36 correct final sigma to regular sigma l. 2: <:Ἡλίου|reg|Ἡλίους:> ; dash of καλου into the following line 3. -μέν̣ῃ (everywhere) l. 4 add a space between διερμηνευθέντων and Ἑλληνι (+ hyphen at the beginning of next line) l. 5. vac.3 => vac.? Also vac. => vac.? ἐ̣ π̣ῳδή without space l. 6 change word division: μή̣λ̣ῳ̣τ̣ ῷ̣δ̣[ε] => μή̣λ̣ῳ̣ τ̣ῷ̣δ̣[ε] l. 8 add space ᾗἂ̣ν => ᾗ ἂ̣ν l. 10 remove space μαίνοι το  μαίνοιτο l. 11 remove space ἤ τε => ἤτε l. 13 delete one sigma + underdot the remaining one: παύςσα̣ι̣το => παύσ̣α̣ι̣το l. 16 add ano teleia at the end of the line l. 18 ὁ̣ ((Δεινα)) · => [ὁ (δ(ε)ῖ(να)) ·] l. 19 x2, 20, 23 (ff.) change how deina is solved: ((Δεινα)) => (δ(ε)ῖ(να)) l. 24 remove vertical pipes: \|ἢ σταθεῖσ̣α̣|/ => \ἢ σταθεῖσ̣α̣/; add space before εἰς: .2εἰς => .2 εἰς l. 25 ἕ̣ω̣ς => ἕ̣ω̣ς̣; regularize: <:στοργήν|reg|τοργήν:> <:ἀ̣24.- ναν.1[ca.3].1|alt|<:ἀ24.- ναγγ[ελία]ν|reg|ἀ̣24.- νανγ̣[ελία]ν̣:>:> Delete (28, outdent) etc. Check white spaces, e.g. in l. 28 l. 32 correct: <:αὐτῇ|reg|αὐτῇς:> l. 33 add white space ἐπ’ ἐκείνῃ l. 38 add white space δ’ οὐχ l. 40 final sigma in β̣ά̣σ̣α̣νοσ l. 41 μ̣ή̣τ̣ εδύς̣εω̣ν̣ wrong breaking, sigma: => μ̣ή̣τ̣ε δύσ̣εω̣ν̣; [ψα.3] => [ca.3] l.42 add white space λάβοι ο l. 44, 45, 49, => (δ(ε)ῖ(να)) l. 53 remove first μ and add dot to alpha Ἄμμ̣[μων => Ἄ̣μ̣[μων add regularizations as in the apparatus in GEMF for col. ii too.
Submit - nuova digitalizzazione per progetto di dottorato

bibl.title: The Greek Magical Papyri in Translation, Including the Demotic Spells. Second Edition.

listBibl.bibl: S.Schoske e.a., Schönheit - Abglanz der Göttlichkeit, Schriften aus der ägyptischen Sammlung 5, 1990, p.148
